Description: Ensure that SMBv1 is disabled to prevent legacy protocol exploitation.

Policy Name: Enable Admin Approval Mode for Built-in Administrator
Description: Ensure UAC is enabled for the built-in administrator account.
Ensure password is required when the system resumes from sleep.
Ensure the built-in Guest account is disabled.
Ensure SmartScreen is enabled to help protect against malicious websites.
Ensure that Windows Defender Antivirus is enabled.
Ensure passwords are at least 14 characters in length.
Ensure screen saver is enabled to lock the system after idle.
Ensure screen saver activates after 15 minutes of inactivity.
Require users to press CTRL+ALT+DEL before logging on.
